item.title: Cloud Composer in a Nutshell
item.description: Intro This post is part of a series of posts with notes as I’m studying for Google’s Professional Data Engineer Certification. This particular post deals with Cloud Composer. Disclaimer The content of these posts is written before I have taken the exam. I do not guarantee the accuracy or long-term reliability of these notes. Use them at your own risk and always defer to Google’s docs as canon. Cloud Composer Managed Apache Airflow Create DAGs (Directed Acyclic Graph) Scheduling: Periodic (pull) (specified in the Airflow GUI - e.
